channel.title: Comments on: Successful Consulting Series – Time Management
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Kevin Conan
item.dc:creator: Kevin Conan
item.description: Amost everywhere I've worked has had some form of time tracking software (all FTE jobs). I never have an issue with them for 1 simple reason, log your time while you work! As you change tasks log the start/end of the previous task so that you don't have to try to remember later. :)
item.content:encoded: Amost everywhere I’ve worked has had some form of time tracking software (all FTE jobs). I never have an issue with them for 1 simple reason, log your time while you work! As you change tasks log the start/end of the previous task so that you don’t have to try to remember later. ðŸ™‚
